name: The search of Arnau
description:
This level has been created for Make A Level Game Jam, so enjoy it :D

In this game you have to control Arnaú, and in order to finally get your long-awaited trip to hell you must overcome obstacles and enemies to reach the devil himself.

Can you do it?

Press download to go directly to the link and download the files

Leave a comment

DEVELOPED BY:
CÉSAR LEÓN (DESIGN AND PROGRAMMING)
MAURICIO NUÑEZ (DESIGN)
ANDRÉS CARBONELL (MUSIC)
